content.raw:
I agree with @dan77062. IMO you're adding restrictions at the last minute that will impact that ability of teams to address the actual robot problems. This entire AWS/Docker/roscore communication situation is a mess. I expect I could spend all my time between now and the practice sessions getting that all to work. 

*It would be non-trivial to implement selective delay at the ROS level.*

 I don't have a lot of sympathy with that comment, @cmericli. It's non-trivial for each team do setup this alternate communications setup. How about you provide the secondary roscore communications channel in the FC so the teams don't have to do the work? 

None of this was in the original Team Agreements and competition rules. I don't raise petty objections but this is getting absurd.
